name: letternumbersequencing
0:
”Alexa, Start playing letter number sequencing”
”start the game”
”Alexa, Open letter number sequencing and test memory”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter number sequencing
des: This skill is used to evaluate performance of persons memory based on their age, which is evaluated outside of the app. The app tries to check the memory score for different adults and map the score to evaluate their cognitive performance. the scores are evaluated offline for cognitive abilities
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
